meanings.definition: shining with a harsh, bright light
meanings.sent1: The glary sun made me squint.
meanings.sent2: The glary headlights blinded the driver.
meanings.sent3: The glary reflection off the water was like a mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her glary smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The glary neon sign attracted customers from afar.
